pageTitle: Check your answers before sending your application

declaration.heading: By applying you agree that:
declaration.bullets_html:
• the information is correct and complete as far as you know
  • you’ll pay back any money you’re overpaid if you’re asked to
declaration.information: You could be prosecuted or have to pay a financial penalty if you deliberately give the wrong or incomplete information or do not report changes.

error.submission-locked: Your claim is still being submitted.
error.claim-service-failure: Something went wrong and your claim has not been sent yet. Please try submitting again.
